activities: We process personal information from individuals, including individuals in the EU, for the purpose of providing testing and assessment services and related services on behalf of global testing customers.  We also receive personal information from employees for the purpose of administering benefits and company policies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer and candidate data, human resources/employee data, off-line, on-line, manual
privacyprograms: Prometric employs a self-assessment program to verify that the attestations and assertions made about its privacy practices herein are true and that its privacy practices have been implemented appropriately.
recoursemech: We will use the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs); for Switzerland we will use the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
